website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic option for buyers needing an accessory-packed glow stick set at a cheaper price.
pros: Comes with 100 glow sticks, 36 LED finger lights, and 12 flashing rings
Fits both adults and children well
Finger lights and rings work with an on and off switch for longer light time
cons: Many customers claimed the finger lights and glow sticks were dim when compared with the flashing rings

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment, only 1/2 of the products actually worked
customer_reviews.text: The assortment and presentation was very impressive, but the actual product had a LOT of duds. Only 1/2 of the light up items actually worked. Was very upset when we found out after giving everything away and not being able to return them. Seller reached out to see if everything was good with my purchase, but then went silent when I told him the truth. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: dgolf0801

customer_reviews.title: glad i went with this
customer_reviews.text: cute, glad i went with this. its for my daughters sweet 16 coming up in a few weeks and i think it will be a big hit with all the kids. I did order 2 and glad i did because its a combo of stuff more glow sticks then rings or light. the finger light did not have instructions on where u turn it on but the switch is under the rubber band, you just slide it up or back for on and off
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Too many duds
customer_reviews.text: Blinking rings are made of sticky rubber similar to the wall walker toys. Hard to turn on. 4 didnt work on arrival. Flashlight rings are okay, but six didn't work on arrival, and several ring bands broke on checking them out. The glow bracelets barely glowed.
customer_reviews.author: amrtine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible glow sticks and many broken items.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old daughters roller skating birthday party and to say I was disappointed doesn’t even begin to describe how I felt. Please save your money and buy a different set of glow sticks. 3 of the rings were broken. At least a dozen of the laser pointers were broken. The bracelets barely lit up. It was truly a sad set of glow sticks and I was embarrassed to have given them out.
customer_reviews.author: Akajt98

customer_reviews.title: great variety and long glow time
customer_reviews.text: Loved this party pack! Great selection of fun glow in the dark items. We used some for party favors - the flashing/blinking rings and the finger pointer lights were a HUGE hit! One night, we used about 30 of the glow sticks in the bathtub and had a "bath in the dark" - the next night the sticks were STILL glowing so we used the same sticks two nights in a row. The 3rd night the sticks were still glowing, but not as bright as the first 2 nights. We are also planning on using the bulk of this party pack this summer for the kids around the campfire. We will be ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this kit!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 12-year-old daughter's birthday glow party. This was a great pack, worth the price. There were tons of "laser" looking rings and flashing /blinking rubber rings, as well as tons of glow sticks. We place them all over a room in our house and turned it into a really fun dance party! I felt that the rings were good quality, for this type of thing. They also made a long chain out of all the glow necklaces and hung it from the ceiling. Everything lasted a long time and made for a great party. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lpeterso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Teen Sleepover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a pop-up "shop" teen sleepover party. The pop up shop contained shopping baskets, these glow in the dark items, journals, pens, mechanical pencils, sleeping masks, etc. The girls loved these glow in the dark products and there were a LOT of them. Rather than create necklaces and bracelets with the straight pieces, they cracked them to activate and scattered them around the room and had fun using the rings and finger flashlights. All were perfect for a one evening event. They are not made to last long (even the finger flashlights) but really great for a sleepover. Super fun.
customer_reviews.author: justanothermom

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties and for Kids Anytime!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing for the price! When it came, not all of the rings were working so I contacted the seller and they made good on the product immediately! We'll be using these for birthday parties and night parties over the summer for the kids. Glowing things are a must have with kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jen McMeans

customer_reviews.title: Halloween handouts
customer_reviews.text: These were part of Halloween handouts to trick or treaters, along with zipper bracelets. Everything was a big hit! So nice to have alternatives to candy. Everything worked really well. A few of the glow bracelets didn't look like they were working but they were just not as bright as some colors. Nothing was broken or defective. Overall I am very pleased and may do it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than enough glow sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a ton of glow sticks. I don't have much to say about quality. They are the same as you would get at Walmart or dollar store except you get a ton of them. Kids can have as many glow sticks as they want. Will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Spiker

customer_reviews.title: Dino Cars
customer_reviews.text: The first set of car had to be returned because the front wheels on one wouldn't turn. They set me a replacement quickly, and I returned the defective ones. My dino loving, 4 yr old grandson, was thrilled; he plays with them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Branch

customer_reviews.title: Great little dinosaurs on wheels
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son was quite happy with these little dinosaurs on wheels. Was occupied with them for the whole day and was especially happy to find that they can also drive on their own after they are moved back. Build quality is quite nice and there are large number of texture bumps in them so it is quite useful for finger development.
customer_reviews.author: Nadezhda

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These little Dino cars are not worth the money. When you pull them back there is no click to indicate when to stop and when you let go they only go a short distance. If you pull back too much, they just spin in a circle instead of going straight. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: QueenLyfe

customer_reviews.title: These Are Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old niece loves them! She could not wait to open the package. These four miniature dinosaur cars are very durable and hey have a nice design. These are great for children to use their imagination and have fun . . . Great for stocking stuffers, party favors, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for last minute giveaways for a spotanious community event. I was mortified when the glow brackets broke while bending the brackets and leaked all over my clothing.. The rings broke quickly the I my thing worth getting was the finger lights . Will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of effort and time
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cheap plastic and very very small. Terrible value. Ordered these right before a Christmas party for a few little boys. Had to run out at the last minute to find another gift because something else ordered would not arrive on time. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: These types of toys are usually very cheap looking, and flimsy. These particular ones are awesome because they're good quality, detailed, and they even come with an educational chart for kids to learn the specific dinosaur names. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Some lights did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the product. Got them to give away on Halloween instead of candy. Several of the finger lights did not light up. There were very few rings maybe 20 and 3 or 4 did not even work. The chem lights were very dim. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these dinosaurs. Was nice to have “babies” he could play with as well. Only improvement I would love to see is more firm in standing upright. He is two and sometimes has melt downs when they fall over. Very bright and colorful. They have taken many “Dino baths” with him and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Caniano

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great for large groups. Handed them out at a block party to all th kids and they went crazy for these things. I was able to give everyone glow sticks and the light up rings and finger things made excellent prizes for games we were playing. A few of the light ups things didn't work but a very few. All the glow sticks worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Patrick OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Glow sticks are a disappointment and don't last longer than a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: The finger lights are good, although the strap breaks easily. Not all finger rings turn on right away, but I was able to get them to work. The glow sticks are really not very good. Especially the pink and red ones which lasted all of about three minutes each. It is a much better buy to purchase glow sticks from a Dollar Tree store. You don't get many in a package, but they lasted almost 18 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Overall was disappointed. The glow sticks were very dim. Barely glowed at all. The LED lights were ok when they worked. I would say there was a %10 fail rate. The other LEDs the plastic split apart and the slide switches jammed or stopped working. They seem like a good deal but the quality was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright and fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast with them at my daughters party. The rings were a bit big for 8 year old fingers, but they just stretched them into bracelets. I appreciated them even more when the power went out at the skating rink and we had cake and ice cream to the light of glow sticks !!
customer_reviews.author: LisaT

customer_reviews.title: We get these for our family camping trip and everyone loves them
customer_reviews.text: We get these to play with on our family camping trip, and everyone from the littlest grandchild, to the oldest adult loves them! Perfect around a campfire.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easily cracks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product, which was a deviation from my typical brand, to save some money. Unfortunately, this product is made with cheaper materials and the plastic cracked and spilled the content. I had not noticed until there was glowing spots all over the room. Needless to say that I will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Guleed Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: What cute and durable Dinos. Well packaged and the perfect hand size for a little guy to grasp, pull back and let go. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WindsorON

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought these dinosaurs for my son and he loves them so much. He is 4 and he loves both dinosaurs and cars. These dinosaurs-cars are well priced and worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Best present for your toddler boys !!!
customer_reviews.text: The 2 yr old and the 4 yr old ABSOLUTELY loved these dinosaur trucks. They now think that MISS BEVY is the greatest!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hold

customer_reviews.title: Beware lots of defective Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family and i to use for a New Years Eve Glow In The Dark Party . I had more defective items than I had working ones . Was only able to use less than half of the box due to broken and dim pieces. Glow sticks barely even glowed and forget the finger lights the rubber band was busted on a lot of them. The rings were ok but stopped glowing bright after the third hour. All in all I wouldn't recommend or at least have a back up plan.
customer_reviews.author: EvelynS

customer_reviews.title: Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I read other reviews that some of the finger lights didnt work, so I was hesitant to buy. However I was glad I bought these. I did have just a few that didn't work but they have excellent customer service and they were quicly replaced no problem. I would definitely use this vendor again purchase these again. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yo-Dee D.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute product .purchase for a 3 year old who was super happy when he opened them.Nice product .Pretty durable for childs playtime.They are made of very hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri M

customer_reviews.title: The receiver loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the gift the little boy that recievedvthem loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hilde

customer_reviews.title: Flying Wherls
customer_reviews.text: My grandson 4 yrs old play with friends racing them he’s learned how to rub their wheels certain ways to make them flip & do other Ricks & race his friends. Must buy simple times & imagination great solid product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great assortment!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great assortment to give out at Halloween. I especially like the finger pointers I think the kids will get a kick out of those. It is supposed to be dark and gloomy this Halloween and I think having these is also good safety.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Micelli

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied Nana!
customer_reviews.text: I sent these as a gift for my 3 year old grandson. My daughter said they were a huge hit with all the boys in the house (young and old) and that he took them to bed with him, he loved them so much! Nice size, not super small but just right for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Loved this box set!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit. My family did an easter glow in the dark egg hunt. The rings and finger lights fit perfect into the eggs. We played with everything in the box in one night. It was a LOT of items though. Will be purchasing it again for our glow In the dark slumber party!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Goheen

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great variety of glow in the dark items. I used it for my daughter's 9th birthday party goodie bags. The kids loved everything! Every item worked well and the kids had a great time with them. This is an awesome deal. Great price for a lot of items. I'd definitely buy this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Funny cars
customer_reviews.text: very funny cars. very light. safe for baby. I bought for a gift. I thank my design for the child was pleased as he did not have such machines. Thank you satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ksena Shabaeva

customer_reviews.title: Great glow pack!
customer_reviews.text: There were so many glow sticks that the kids couldn't get through them all! All of the products worked great and glowed for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: First, I thought they are too small. Now I’m happy with their size, my kids always carry smth when we go out, now they take this and carry it themselves! Also, great quality, durable material. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tornike Zabakhidze

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for transformer and dino lovers
customer_reviews.text: "wow!" Was the first thing my daughter said when I showed her this. He is a hardcore dino lovers and now picked up an interest in transformer, so no doubt this would be an amazing toy to her.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These made the concert in the park so much fun! Especially when the sun went down 😬
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnston

customer_reviews.title: not all working
customer_reviews.text: three worked, but even one of the three didn't go straight. The other two were fine
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Coller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful deal and everything worked and was such a big hit for my daughters glow-in-the-dark party. All the girls got to take home their rings and bracelets and their finger flashlights. Perfect for parties and take-home gifts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my son's 8 yr old birthday party. The package arrived on time, the contents were as described. good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly durable
customer_reviews.text: Cool gift for nephews. The material is nice but the point is that they already survived the first week of use that is making the difference :) Kids love them (especially those with horns)
customer_reviews.author: Yaroslav Danylchenko

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered order one box of these and a different dinosaur set from another vendor & ended up returning the other set and order a 2nd box of these! They're great as party favors! And my boys LOVE them! Great value. Delivered on time. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: since I dj I include giveaways in a lot of my packages, and this package of favors is usually fantastic. However, lately I have been running into issues with the batteries in the rings and finger lights not working. This significantly reduces the amount of giveaways I have. I would give 5 stars if I knew the majority of the pieces would work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glow Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These glow sticks didn't seem to last as long as advertised and were not as bright. Kids still loved them, so that was a plus. Easy to use and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle/no tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 little nephews who will both play with these wonderful dinosaurs and be learning about them at the same time-this is a great gift for them!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Great to fill party favors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fill party favors for my daughters birthday. The kids loved the rings but where a little confused by the finger lights until they figured out how to use them. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Duck fan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The son really liked the cars, he was interested in organizing races, a fun toy for different ages.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I may have just not read enough about these before I bought them. I thought they were a good size, they are each about two inches. Otherwise they are cute
customer_reviews.author: Tala Hope

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a child
customer_reviews.text: thanks so much for product that is very realistic .we are giving this to our great grand son as a Christmas gift,and iam so glad the information paper that came with it,thanks again,Joanne Jones Fremont,Ohio
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE JONES

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work OK. The glow sticks aren't especially bright, and last only a few hours, but they work. The rings work just fine, but the finger lights are a bit awkward to use. Not bad for the price, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Good Party Pack
customer_reviews.text: So far all the glow sticks have worked. The rings have worked. Had five of finger lights not light up. But wouldn't return for 5 duds. Overall very good purchase. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price! It was an engaging and sturdy toy set. I bought it because of the matching big/little sets, and the child using them loved the pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennica Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Don't work right, but still fun.
customer_reviews.text: Cars do not work properly. When pulled back they do not move, however, I will be keeping them as my grandsons like to play with them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Zito

customer_reviews.title: average quality
customer_reviews.text: The products looks very good on the picture as well as physically, but the quality is poor, several of the dinosaurs dont stand up and constantly felt down, so we are not very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Saloni

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Several of the finger lights did not work, it seemed like the batteries were bad
customer_reviews.author: Wellspoken

customer_reviews.title: Kids love glow items
customer_reviews.text: The rings and bracelets were a hit with the trick or treaters, but the little flashlight pieces were not the best. They have a rubber band to attach them to something, though I couldn't think of anything to attach them to. Also, too small for small children.
customer_reviews.author: MsAquamarine

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait for my grandson to open these. He loves cars and dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied for the price I know some of the finger lights didn’t work, but that could have been damage from shipping, the kids loved everything and there was plenty that if some didn’t work we still had plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boys love dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! My son loves it, it is his new favorite thing to play with. He has many cars and monster trucks but this one has quickly become his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Prefect gift to my son!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got this toys to my son as a gift and he loved them a lot! Such a cool design, very durable, good quality. Recommend it! Kids will be satisfied with these toys
customer_reviews.author: Madina Kusherbayeva

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great, Great, Great!! They were perfect for skating ring party! Kids Lived them!! Everything worked and more than enough to go around.
customer_reviews.author: Dominica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old boy loves these toys. Definitely durable, great toy if your children love dinosaurs. A change from dinosaur figures.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Some rings dud not work out if the box most that did work petered out after an hour glow sticks were not bright, finger light bands were child size. Wouldn't reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Corey Dubey

customer_reviews.title: DinoFUN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who's dino-expert and also loves cars. At 6 years of age this toy was an instant hit for all the kids, even girls. Do far so good, but it's been only few weeks, so the time will tell about durability. However, it's a fun toy that can be shared with 3 other buddies for hours of races and other games.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad G.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These items are great. My grandchildren love running around in the dark glowing! I'm very pleased with items and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Wollesen

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stop playing with them
customer_reviews.text: My nephews love these. They work so well. A couple had horns that were a little sharp, but I could easily cut the tips off!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Pinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it but when I went to use them I realized that in one of the boxes came only 11 small dinosaur, it is missing the Apatosaurus 30 feet tall. Please, I want to receive the missing dinosaur
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Roar!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. I am certain that our 2 year old will be delighted with Santa's gift for him, he's obsessed with dinosaurs (just like his grandpa was).
customer_reviews.author: jsw5269

customer_reviews.title: I love them and they will to I have a wooden ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them and they will to I have a wooden Stand for cupcakes these will set all over them with the cupcakes. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Most pieces worked as they should. But some of the rings did not work. The finger lights are really tight and hurt to wear. The bracelets are just a little small. They fit on a woman's wrist, but not on a man's. It was fun, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Cute party favors
customer_reviews.text: Good supply of fun and cute party favors. Package came promptly and without incident. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: 1972TMZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and the perfect stocking stuffer! My 5 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Definitely  NOT Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, these TINY cars are worth about 50 cents each. I suspect that this is one of those situations where someone purchased the merchandise at the dollar store then resold it here. Disappointing at best.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita G.

customer_reviews.title: Happy kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoyed getting his birthday gift early. We have a playmat that can be used to setup his new dinosaurs. Some are able to stand on their own, 2 tip right over. But that doesn't stop his new T-Rex from making them food.
customer_reviews.author: Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for party favors for my granddaughter s birthday party. The kids loved them. I read other reviews and I had no issues with any of the toys lighting up. All worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tmans

customer_reviews.title: great for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: great for little kids who are into dinosaurs and cars. not the best quality but it’s also inexpensive. Worth the price since my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Youn L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price! Bought these for my son's 'glow party' and it was a hit with the kids (and teens). I wish the blue bracelets would glow as bright as the green, though...
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable. I bough these for a 6 year old. I am sure he will love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Popular with Kids and Adults
customer_reviews.text: Olympia, WA holds a Luminary Procession around Earth Day every year. I like to make sure the children and adults are Luminary too. The LED glow toys were a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: George C Hough Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. I bought this for my daughter's roller skating party. This pack was so much fun. a couple of rings didn't light up, but over all a lot for a great value!! would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 3 yr. old Grandson. It was a big hit! It comes with a laminated list with pictures of all the dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Luera

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but four of the rings didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old girl loves them as a birthday gift 🎁 . And I am happy with my purchase and the shipping. Thank you Dino king
customer_reviews.author: Siham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take with you!
customer_reviews.text: it's a great gift for my god son. he likes dinosaurs. it's great because combine two things: cars and dinosaurs. i like it, and he likes them a lot. great quality. nothing bad to say. they are not heavy and not big, which make them easy to take anywhere with you! recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: The rings are fun but the rest of it is just cheap junk. The long glow sticks don't link together well and the finger things are just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew went nuts over all these dinosaurs. He played with them the rest of the night, named all of them and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Staples

customer_reviews.title: ... used these for a slumber party and the kids loved them. There are so many pieces in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a slumber party and the kids loved them. There are so many pieces in this kit and the kids can get very creative. I found this to be a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A-ROAR-ABLE TOY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item twice!!! Super cute and fun...a five year old and 2 year old approved the fun side of these Dino-cars!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: The rings and the bracelets had a few lemons but for as many as you get it was not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  good value.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dinosaurs in different sizes & colors. Engaged my 3 year old grandson nicely. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves dinosaurs so he is going to love this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good for favors
customer_reviews.text: Good variety pack for a good value. I got them as party favors for the kiddos and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: PAM, TX USA

customer_reviews.title: The led finger lights were terrible and the glow sticks very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The rubber led rings in this pack are the only reason I’m giving two stars. They were awesome. The led finger lights were terrible. 1/3 of them didn’t work and another 1/3 the rubber bands snapped when they kids were putting them on their fingers. The glow sticks were disappointing as well, very little brightness. They lasted long enough, but they didn’t glow bright at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old nephew and he loved them! Perfect combo between dinosaurs and cars
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! You pull them back and they race! I was surprised by the good quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Gilding Flakes Kavave 3 Bottles
product_meta.description:
GLOW BRACELET
1 tube of 100 units glow bracelets. These are a huge hit at any party. Whether you are using it as a bracelet or connecting them together to make necklaces or crowns, glow sticks are fun for all ages. Package includes high quality both glow sticks and connectors. 
Easy to use, there are two kinds of liquid in the plastic stick, when you bend the stick, the two liquid come together and glow, then you connect the two ends with the connector. 


 *  Size: 8 inches(5*200mm) 
 *  Colors: pink, green, blue, yellow, orange, red, white, purple
 *  Material: polyethylene
 *  Glowing time: 6 hours



LED FINGER LIGHT
36 units Led finger lights, held by elastic band to fit fingers comfortably. They look dramatically beautiful when you wave them in the dark, providing up to hours of illumination to outlast any event or festivity. 
 *  color of light: red, green, blue, white
 *  color of shell: red, green, blue, white
 *  material: plastic



LED RING
12 units super Bright Flashing LED Bumpy Rings. The elastic rubber ring will fit any finger size, from toddlers to adults. There are 4 designs -crown, pompom, rose and strawberry. On the back of each ring is a small ON/OFF switch button that can be seen and felt through the rubber, this enables the lights to be turned on and off. Each flashing ring rapidly flashes three super bright LED colors. 
 *  shell colors: red, purple, blue, pink, yellow
 *  light colors: red, blue, yellow
 *  material: soft gum
 *  battery: AG10,3pcs
 *  flashing time: 6-8 hours



Each LED Toy Ring Is Small and Thus Toy Rings Should Be Kept Away From children under 3
feature_bullets: ❤️ALL INCLUSIVE PACKAGE GREAT PARTY MAKER Perfect for parties birthday, graduation, wedding, concert shows. Make the atmosphere so cool. Use your imagination and fantastic ideas to make all types of lights and bring happiness to everyone.
❤️PREMIUM QUALITY SUPER BRIGHT & LONG- LASTING ILLUMINATION New High quality products more durable and better assembled lasting hours of illumination. Awesome and Eye-catching.
❤️ADULTS AND KIDS WILL LOVE THEM One size fits all. Kids just love them. They are great party favorites for everyone. You can give them away to your children, grandchildren, nieces and nephews.

❤️EASY TO USE: Glow bracelet - bend the stick and it will glow. Led bumpy ring - on the back of each ring is a small ON/OFF switch button that can be seen and felt through the rubber, this enables the lights to be turned on and off. Led finger light - Held by elastic band so that you can attach to any fingers. The switch on the top of the finger light can be turned on and off.

❤️PACKAGE CONTENTS: GLOW BRACELET – 100 high quality glow sticks and connectors. You can use it as a bracelet or connecting them together to make necklaces or crowns. Colors: pink, green, blue, yellow, orange, red, white and purple. LED FINGER LIGHT - 36 Led finger lights red, blue, green and white. Held by elastic band and fit fingers comfortably. LED BUMPY RING – 12 Super Bright Flashing Rings with Batteries. 4 designs (crown, pompom, rose and strawberry), 5 Colors.
